title: Agora and Forum of Trajan comparison

content.question: The development of the Athenian agora as a public space differed substantially from the Forum of Trajan in that the agora

choices.label: evolved gradually over centuries in response to political change
incorporated buildings dedicated to secular and religious functions
served as the primary residential sector for the cityâ€™s aristocracy
used axial planning to highlight a series of military monuments

content.answer: evolved gradually over centuries in response to political change

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
